Html:
Hi Agustin,

I couldn't find any Prism 4 training toolkit for WPF. Please give the link for Prism 4 WPF training toolkit. It will be very helpful for me to learn quickly about Prism 4 framework implementation in WPF.

Thanks and Regards,

Sakthi

Hi,

The Prism Training Kit mentioned before in this thread only contain Labs done with Silverlight. However, it should be noted that code can be easily shared between Silverlight and WPF in most cases, so this shouldn’t cause major difficulties when understanding the concepts explained in the hands-on labs.

If you are interested about the differences between WPF and Silverlight you can check the following chapter of the Prism documentation at MSDN:

  • Chapter 10: Sharing Code Between Silverlight and WPF, Contrasting Silverlight and WPF

Regards,

Agustin Adami
http://blogs.southworks.net/aadamiï»¿
